properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TAB_CS WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , CATEGORY , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID , BOARD_COUNT , REGIST_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM TAB_CS C JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = ? ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , USER_ID , REGIST_DATE , BOARD_COUNT , CATEGORY , C_EMP , C_DEPT , ANSWER_CONTENT , PHONE , EMAIL , USER_NAME , USER_DATE , USER_TYPE FROM TAB_CS C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
